Registration & Consultation", + description: "Begin your publishing journey with our streamlined onboarding process:", + details: [ + "Complete our author registration form (takes <5 minutes)", + "Schedule free 30-min consultation with publishing strategist", + "Receive personalized publishing roadmap", + "Get ISBN assignment & copyright guidance" + ], + stats: { + icon: Users, + text: "95% of authors complete registration in under 8 minutes" + } + }, + { + icon: PenTool, + title: "2. Design & Formatting", + description: "Professional transformation of your manuscript:", + details: [ + "Dedicated design team (5+ years avg. experience)", + "3-5 cover design concepts to choose from", + "Professional typesetting for print & digital", + "Access to 1000+ licensed fonts & design assets" + ], + stats: { + icon: Clock, + text: "Average 48-hour turnaround for initial concepts" + } + }, + { + icon: FileCheck, + title: "3. Review & Approval", + description: "Collaborative refinement process:", + details: [ + "Dedicated project manager assigned", + "Unlimited revision rounds for 14 days", + "Print-proof digital mockups", + "DRM-free eBook formatting" + ], + stats: { + icon: ShieldCheck, + text: "100% satisfaction guarantee on final designs" + } + }, + { + icon: Globe, + title: "4. Global Distribution", + description: "Worldwide publishing network activation:", + details: [ + "150+ countries distribution network", + "25,000+ retail partners including Amazon & Barnes & Noble", + "Automated ISBN registration", + "Multi-format eBook conversion" + ], + stats: { + icon: BarChart, + text: "87% books live on store shelves within 72h" + } + }, + { + icon: Lightbulb, + title: "5. Marketing & Promotion", + description: "Strategic visibility enhancement:", + details: [ + "Custom marketing plan development", + "Social media assets creation", + "Press release distribution", + "Book review outreach program" + ], + stats: { + icon: Users, + text: "Average 300% increase in initial visibility" + } + }, + { + icon: DollarSign, + title: "6. Royalty & Analytics", + description: "Transparent financial tracking:", + details: [ + "Real-time royalty dashboard access", + "Monthly direct deposits (minimum $25 threshold)", + "Sales performance analytics", + "Audited financial reporting" + ], + stats: { + icon: BarChart, + text: "92% authors see ROI within first 6 months" + } + } + ]; + + return ( +
